title: Rulers have not understood gravity of present crisis: Ravi Kumudesh
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Commenting on the May Day, President of the Association of Health Professionals, Ravi Kumudesh said there is no one in this country to listen to the burdens faced by the working class.
He a that Sri Lanka does not have a responsible President, Prime Minister nor Political Party Leaders in the country.

Whilst pointing out that the country has become bankrupt, Kumudesh said in the future, the Government may not even be able to pay the proper salaries to workers while the Health System is on the verge collapsing.
He said that neither rulers nor the Parliamentarians seemed to have understood the gravity of the present crisis.
Rulers have not understood gravity of present crisis: Ravi Kumudesh
